metadata.title: CVE-2024-46728 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check index for aux_rd_interval before usingaux_rd_interval has size of 7 and should be checked.This fixes 3 OVERRUN and 1 INTEGER_OVERFLOW issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
